title: Naivete

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Investigate a player at night, learning their role if they are town.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - If your target is not town, they will appear as a randomly chosen town role, and they will be notified that they have shown up as X role to the Naivete. Investigating them again will not change the result.

desc:
Post 1268
*Why do people intentionally bring harm to others? It makes no sense at all.*
